import React from 'react' import { Typography,Card, CardActions, Button, CardContent, CardMedia } from '@material-ui/core' import useStyles from './styles' const Cartitem = ({item}) => { const classes = useStyles(); console.log(item.line_items); return ( {item.name} {item.line_total.formatted_with_symbol}
{item.quantity}
) } export default Cartitem
